$ cd vim

$ sudo ./configure --with-features=huge --enable-multibyte --enable-gpm --enable-cscope --enable-fontset --enable-fail-if-missing --prefix=/usr/local --enable-python3interp --enable-rubyinterp --enable-gui=auto --enable-gtk2-check

$ sudo make && sudo make install```
